translated: Points of Controversy
The Great Fifty
The twentieth chapter
Discussion on the realization of the Dhamma
“Is there realization of the Dhamma for one who sleeps in the womb?”
“Yes.”

original: Atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ, dhammasākacchā, paripucchā, sīlasamādānaṁ, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
analyzed: atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma desanā dhamma ssavana dhamma sākacchā paripucchā sīla samādāne indriyesu gutta dvāra tā bhojane mattaññu tā pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogā uti
translated: “Is there teaching of the Dhamma, listening to the Dhamma, discussing the Dhamma, questioning, taking up the precepts, guarding the sense doors, knowing the right amount in eating, and persistence in wakefulness for one who sleeps in the womb?”
“Is it so that the Blessed One has not declared the four noble truths?” …

original: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogoti?
analyzed: natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma desanā dhamma ssavanam pe pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogā ti
translated: “Is there no teaching of the Dhamma, listening to the Dhamma, discussing the Dhamma, questioning, taking up the precepts, guarding the sense doors, knowing the right amount in eating, and persistence in wakefulness for one who sleeps in the womb?”
“Yes.”

original: Hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammadesanā, dhammassavanaṁ …pe… pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogo, no ca vata re vattabbe—🔽“atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti.
analyzed: hañci natthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma desanā dhamma ssavanam pe pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogaḥ no ca vata re vattabbe  atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma abhisamayaḥ ti
translated: “Then it is not correct to say that there is realization of the Dhamma for one who sleeps in the womb.”
“Is there realization of the Dhamma for one who sleeps in the womb?”
“Yes.”
“Are there not two conditions for the arising of right view—

original: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāroti?
analyzed: paratas ca ghosaḥ yonisaḥ ca manasikāroti
translated: and hearing the Dhamma and giving it proper attention?”
“Yes.”
“Are there two conditions for the arising of right view:🔽hearing the Dhamma and giving it proper attention?

original: parato ca ghoso, yoniso ca manasikāro, no ca vata re vattabbe—🔽“atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhammābhisamayo”ti.
analyzed: paratas ca ghosaḥ yonisaḥ ca manasikāro no ca vata re vattabbe  atthi gabbhaseyyāya dhamma abhisamayaḥ ti
translated: and listening to the Dhamma from another, and appropriate attention, it’s not possible to say:🔽‘There is no realization of the Dhamma through pregnancy and childbirth.’
“Is there realization of the Dhamma while sleeping?”
“Yes.”

analyzed: suttassa pamattassa muṭṭha ssatissa a sampajānassa dhamma abhisamayaḥ ti
translated: “Is there realization of the Dhamma for one who is heedless, muddle-minded, and not fully aware?”
“Is it so that it is not to be said that it is a person who is the same in the eye faculty and the eye consciousness?” …
The Discussion of Realization of the Dhamma is finished.
